author: xsteve
msg: Minor UI improvements, xemacs compatibility fixes
Define match-string-no-properties, if it is not defined (needed for xemacs)
only if it is available (fix for xemacs)
Added svn-status-set-trac-project-root to the trac menu

author: sussman
msg: Locking branch:  fix memory problems spotted by philip.
(get_locks_baton_t):   use a real svn_stringbuf_t, not a pointer to one.
(svn_ra_dav__get_locks):  allocate baton in stack, not heap.
